sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_8ccc89a337a11300b95dae7873990e6e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix Blueprint Request">2c1430e337611300b95dae7873990ed2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d56741ef37611300b95dae7873990e6a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Blueprints</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('blueprint_uuid', 'project_needed', 'Select Project to Load Blueprints...');
	return;
	}

	if (g_form.getValue('project_uuid') != 'select' && g_form.getValue('project_uuid') != 'loading' && g_form.getValue('project_uuid') != 'prism_central_instance_needed') {
		g_form.clearOptions('blueprint_uuid');
		g_form.addOption('blueprint_uuid', 'loading', 'Loading Blueprints...');
		var ret = new GlideAjax('GetBlueprintsByProject');
		ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getBlueprintData');
		ret.addParam('project_uuid', g_form.getValue('project_uuid'));
		ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
		ret.getXML(loadBlueprints);
	}
}

function loadBlueprints(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var blueprint_json = JSON.parse(answer);
	g_form.clearOptions('blueprint_uuid');
	if (blueprint_json.length > 0) {
		g_form.addOption('blueprint_uuid', 'select', 'Select Blueprint');
	} else {
		g_form.addOption('blueprint_uuid', 'select', 'No Blueprints exist for this Project, please select another Project');
	}
	for (var index in blueprint_json) {
		if (blueprint_json.hasOwnProperty(index)) {
			g_form.addOption('blueprint_uuid', JSON.parse(blueprint_json[index]).uuid, JSON.parse(blueprint_json[index]).name);
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-24 14:34:52</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8ccc89a337a11300b95dae7873990e6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>27</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Blueprints</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8ccc89a337a11300b95dae7873990e6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-24 21:30:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1e163f844fe00300cee253418110c72b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetAuthenticationDetails</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetAuthenticationDetails</name><script><![CDATA[var GetAuthenticationDetails = Class.create();
GetAuthenticationDetails.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getDetails: function() {
		var sys_id = this.getParameter('sys_id');
		var auth_json = {};
		var rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_m2m_authentication');
		rec.addQuery('sys_id', '=', sys_id);
		rec.query();
		rec.next();
		auth_json['sys_id'] = '' + rec.sys_id;
		auth_json['authentication_name'] = '' + rec.name;
		auth_json['type'] = '' + rec.authentication_types.type;
		auth_json['user_label'] = '' + rec.authentication_types.user_label;
		auth_json['method'] = '' + rec.authentication_methods.method;
		auth_json['password_label'] = '' + rec.authentication_methods.password_label;
		auth_json['hidden'] = '' + rec.authentication_methods.hidden;
		auth_json['form_field'] = '' + rec.authentication_methods.form_field;
		return JSON.stringify(auth_json);
	},
    type: 'GetAuthenticationDetails'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-08 17:00:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>1e163f844fe00300cee253418110c72b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetAuthenticationDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1e163f844fe00300cee253418110c72b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-11 11:07:29</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_ffc134d2db3303008550f8fdbf96190c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetVMStatus</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetVMStatus</name><script><![CDATA[var GetVMStatus = Class.create();
GetVMStatus.prototype = {
    initialize: function(vm_uuid, cluster_ip) {
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/vms/' + vm_uuid;
		var status, errorMsg, parsed;
		var finished = false;
		var limit = 10;
		var count = 0;
		
		function sleep(milliseconds) {
			var start = new Date().getTime();
			for (var i = 0; i < 1e7; i++) {
				if ((new Date().getTime() - start) > milliseconds){
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		
		do {
			try {
				var response = new CallRestAPI('get', url, cluster_ip, '');
				parsed = JSON.parse(response.response_body);
			} catch(ex) {
				errorMsg = ex;
				status = '500';
			}
				
			status = parsed.status.state;
			gs.info("status is " + status);
			if (status == 'COMPLETE') {
				finished = true;
				status = 'success';
			}
			else if (status == 'PENDING' || status == 'RUNNING') {
					finished = false;
			}
			else {
				finished = true;
				 status = 'failed';
			}
			count++;
			sleep(5000);
		} 
		while(finished == false && count < 10);
		this.status = status;
    },

    type: 'GetVMStatus'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-23 15:33:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>ffc134d2db3303008550f8fdbf96190c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetVMStatus</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_ffc134d2db3303008550f8fdbf96190c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-25 15:13:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_bc3637c24f144300cee253418110c7d1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetClusterConfiguration</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns the cluster configuration based on the name of the cluster passed in.</description><name>GetClusterConfiguration</name><script><![CDATA[var GetClusterConfiguration = Class.create();
GetClusterConfiguration.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
		this.ip = '';
		this.name = '';
		this.fqdn = '';
		this.uuid = '';
		this.env_sys_id = '';
		this.type = '';
		this.desc = '';
	},
	
	setClusterName: function(cluster_name) {
		this.name = cluster_name;
		gs.info("GetClusterConfiguration Cluster Name: " + cluster_name);
	},

	setType: function(type) {
		this.type = type;
	},
	
	getClusterConfigs: function(){
		if (this.name == '' && this.type == '') {
			this.type = 'Default';
		}
		var rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_cluster_configurations');
		if (this.name == '' ) {
			rec.addQuery('type.type', this.type);
		} else {
			rec.addQuery('name', '=', this.name);
		}
		rec.query();
		rec.next();
		if (rec.getRowCount() != 1){
			throw "Invalid record count. Record count not equal to one. Record count = " + rec.getRowCount();
		}
		this.ip =  rec.ip;
		this.name =  rec.name;
		this.fqdn =  rec.fqdn;
		this.uuid =  rec.uuid;
		this.env =  rec.environment.name;
		this.type =  rec.type.type;
		this.desc =  rec.description;
    },
    type: 'GetClusterConfiguration'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-02 11:39:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>bc3637c24f144300cee253418110c7d1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetClusterConfiguration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bc3637c24f144300cee253418110c7d1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-15 15:47:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_659438924f944300cee253418110c77a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.CallRestAPI</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CallRestAPI</name><script><![CDATA[var CallRestAPI = Class.create();
CallRestAPI.prototype = {
    initialize: function(rest_method, url, cluster_ip, request_body) {
		// Get Cluster Credentials
		var rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_cluster_configurations');
		rec.addQuery('ip', '=', cluster_ip);
		rec.query();
		rec.next();
		var user_name = rec.credentials.user;
		var user_password = rec.credentials.password_token.getDecryptedValue();

		// Get Mid Server
		var mid_finder = new global.MIDServerFinder();
		mid_finder.setRangesByIPOrHostname(cluster_ip);
		var mid_server = mid_finder.getMIDServers()[0];
		
		r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Nutanix Rest API', rest_method);
		r.setStringParameter('url_component', url);
		r.setStringParameter('cluster_ip', cluster_ip);
		r.setBasicAuth(user_name,user_password);
		r.setMIDServer(mid_server);
		r.setRequestBody(request_body);
		try {
			response = r.execute();
			this.response_body = response.getBody();
			this.status_code = response.getStatusCode();
			this.error_message = response.getErrorMessage();
		} catch(ex) {
			this.error_message = ex;
			throw ex;
		}
		//gs.addInfoMessage("REST API COMPLETED");
    },
    type: 'CallRestAPI'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-02 16:06:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>659438924f944300cee253418110c77a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CallRestAPI</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_659438924f944300cee253418110c77a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-14 19:29:35</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_8c2909af37611300b95dae7873990efd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix Blueprint Request">2c1430e337611300b95dae7873990ed2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d884b4e337611300b95dae7873990e90</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Blueprint Projects</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'prism_central_instance_needed', 'Select Prism Central Instance to Load Projects...');
		return;
	}

	g_form.clearOptions('project_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'loading', 'Loading Projects...');
	var ret = new GlideAjax('GetProjectsByUser');
	ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getProjectData');
	ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
	ret.getXML(loadProjects);
   
}

function loadProjects(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var project_json = JSON.parse(answer);
	var project_list = project_json['projects'];
	g_form.clearOptions('project_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'select', 'Select Project');
	for (var index in project_list) {
		if (project_list.hasOwnProperty(index)) {
			g_form.addOption('project_uuid', project_list[index].uuid, project_list[index].name);
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-24 14:17:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8c2909af37611300b95dae7873990efd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Blueprint Projects</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8c2909af37611300b95dae7873990efd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-24 14:20:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_f8b37b3f37651300b95dae7873990e3a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus</name><script><![CDATA[var GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus = Class.create();
GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus.prototype = {
    initialize: function(application_uuid, cluster_ip) {
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/apps/' + application_uuid;
		var status, errorMsg, parsed;
		var finished = false;
		var limit = 60;
		var count = 0;
		
		function sleep(milliseconds) {
			var start = new Date().getTime();
			for (var i = 0; i < 1e7; i++) {
				if ((new Date().getTime() - start) > milliseconds){
					break;
				}
			}
		}
		
		do {
			try {
				var response = new CallRestAPI('get', url, cluster_ip, '');
				parsed = JSON.parse(response.response_body);
			} catch(ex) {
				errorMsg = ex;
				status = '500';
			}
				
			status = parsed.status.state;
			gs.info("status is " + status);
			if (status == 'running') {
				finished = true;
				status = 'success';
			}
			else if (status == 'provisioning') {
				finished = false;
			}
			else {
				finished = true;
				status = 'failed';
			}
			count++;
			sleep(5000);
		} 
		while(finished == false && count <= limit);
		this.status = status;
    },

    type: 'GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-25 21:24:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>f8b37b3f37651300b95dae7873990e3a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBlueprintDeploymentStatus</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_f8b37b3f37651300b95dae7873990e3a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-25 21:53:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a3e01da737a11300b95dae7873990e86
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetBlueprintsByProject</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetBlueprintsByProject</name><script><![CDATA[var GetBlueprintsByProject = Class.create();
GetBlueprintsByProject.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getBlueprintData : function() {
		var project_uuid = this.getParameter('project_uuid');
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/blueprints/list';
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('post', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{}');
			status = response.status_code;
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			return JSON.stringify(this.parseBlueprintData(responseBody, project_uuid));
		} catch(ex) {
			errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parseBlueprintData : function(response, project_uuid) {
		var blueprint_data = JSON.parse(response);
		var blueprint_list = [];
		for (var index in blueprint_data.entities) {
			if (blueprint_data.entities[index].status.state == 'ACTIVE') {
				if (blueprint_data.entities[index].metadata.project_reference.uuid == project_uuid) {
					var blueprint_name = blueprint_data.entities[index].metadata.name;
					var blueprint_uuid = blueprint_data.entities[index].metadata.uuid;
					blueprint_list.push('{"name":"' + blueprint_name  + '","uuid":"' + blueprint_uuid + '"}');
				}
			}
		}
		return blueprint_list;

	},
	
    type: 'GetBlueprintsByProject'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-24 15:05:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>a3e01da737a11300b95dae7873990e86</sys_id><sys_mod_count>53</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBlueprintsByProject</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a3e01da737a11300b95dae7873990e86</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-25 12:55:01</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_5cc9a0e64fdc4300cee253418110c769
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetCatalogItem</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetCatalogItem</name><script><![CDATA[var GetCatalogItem = Class.create();
GetCatalogItem.prototype = {
    initialize: function(catalog_name) {
		var rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_catalog_items');
		rec.addQuery('name', '=', catalog_name);
		rec.query();
		rec.next();
		if (rec.getRowCount() != 1){
			throw "Invalid record count. Record count not equal to one. Record count = " + rec.getRowCount();
		}
		this.name = rec.name;
		this.os_type = rec.operating_system.os;
		this.uuid = rec.uuid;
		this.cluster_config_sys_id = rec.cluster_name;
		this.api_specification = rec.api_specification.specification;
		this.guest_customization = rec.guest_customization.specification;
		this.guest_customization_type = rec.guest_customization.type.name;
		this.desc = rec.description;
    },
    type: 'GetCatalogItem'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-03 10:15:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>5cc9a0e64fdc4300cee253418110c769</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetCatalogItem</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5cc9a0e64fdc4300cee253418110c769</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-13 12:04:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1c78d8a60fa003008b1448dce1050ed9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetCatalogItemsByClusterName</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetCatalogItemsByClusterName</name><script><![CDATA[var GetCatalogItemsByClusterName = Class.create();
GetCatalogItemsByClusterName.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getCatalog : function() {
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var os_name = this.getParameter('os_name');
		var catalog_items = [];
		var rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_catalog_items');
		rec.addQuery('cluster_name.name', '=', cluster_name);
		rec.addQuery('operating_system.os', '=', os_name);
		rec.query();
		while(rec.next()) {
			var catalog = '{"item":"' + rec.name + '"}';
			catalog_items.push(catalog);
		}
		return JSON.stringify(catalog_items);
	},

    type: 'GetCatalogItemsByClusterName'

   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var filter = /^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{0,15}$/;
  if(!filter.test(newValue)){
  alert("Only Upper and lowercase letters, numbers and - accepted up to 15 characters.");  
  g_form.setValue('subject_code_string', '');
  }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-15 23:23:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ef1a19554fed32002b4522d18110c740</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Computer Name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ef1a19554fed32002b4522d18110c740</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-22 18:55:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_74c460ae0fa003008b1448dce1050e9f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix VM Request">cdc3888d37cd1300b95dae7873990e5d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:6f498c4137015300b95dae7873990e63</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Catalog Items</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('catalog_item', 'cluster_name_needed', 'Select Cluster and Operating System to Load Catalog Items...');
		return;
	}
	
	g_form.clearOptions('catalog_item');
	g_form.addOption('catalog_item', 'loading', 'Loading Catalog Items...');
	var ret = new GlideAjax('GetCatalogItemsByClusterName');
	ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCatalog');
	ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
	ret.addParam('os_name', g_form.getValue('operating_system'));
	ret.getXML(loadOS);
}
   
function loadOS(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var catalog_items = answer.evalJSON();
	g_form.clearOptions('catalog_item');
	if (catalog_items.length > 0) {
		g_form.addOption('catalog_item', 'select', 'Select Catalog Item');
	} else {
		g_form.addOption('catalog_item', 'select', 'No Catalog Items exist for this OS, plese select another OS');
	}
	for (var catalog in catalog_items) {
		g_form.addOption('catalog_item', JSON.parse(catalog_items[catalog]).item, JSON.parse(catalog_items[catalog]).item);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-08-15 20:04:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>74c460ae0fa003008b1448dce1050e9f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Catalog Items</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_74c460ae0fa003008b1448dce1050e9f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-05 12:18:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7c9c22074f2132002b4522d18110c7ee
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetPd</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetPd</name><script><![CDATA[var GetPd = Class.create();
GetPd.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getPdData : function() {
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/protection_domains/';
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('get', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{}');
			status = response.status_code;
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			gs.info("Get PD Data Response: " + responseBody);
			return JSON.stringify(this.parsePdData(responseBody));
		} catch(ex) {
			errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parsePdData : function(responseBody) {
		var answer_json = JSON.parse(responseBody);
		var pd_list = [];
		var pd_data = answer_json.entities;
		for (var pd in pd_data) {
			if (pd_data[pd].active == true) {
              var pd_json = '{"name":"' + pd_data[pd].name  + '","value":"' + pd_data[pd].active + '"}';
               pd_list.push(pd_json);
           }
		}
		return pd_list;

	},

    type: 'GetPd'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-21 16:25:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>7c9c22074f2132002b4522d18110c7ee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>88</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetPd</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7c9c22074f2132002b4522d18110c7ee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-15 17:19:25</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_50e227930f27430022f2cbdce1050e20
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.MonitorTask</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>MonitorTask</name><script><![CDATA[var MonitorTask = Class.create();
MonitorTask.prototype = {
    initialize: function(taskId, cluster_ip) {
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/tasks/list';
		var filter = "uuid==" + taskId;
		var status, errorMsg, parsed;
		var finished = false;
		var payload = JSON.stringify({"kind": "task","filter": filter});

		do {
			try {
				var response = new CallRestAPI('post', url, cluster_ip, payload);
				parsed = JSON.parse(response.response_body);
			} catch(ex) {
				errorMsg = ex;
				status = '500';
			}
				
			var percentComplete = parsed.entities[0].percentage_complete;
			status = parsed.entities[0].status;
			if (percentComplete == 100) {
				finished = true;
				if  (status == 'SUCCEEDED') {
					status = 'success';
				} else {
					status = 'failed';
				}
			} else {
				finished = false;
			}
		} while(finished == false);
		this.status = status;
    },
    type: 'MonitorTask'

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_05b310b20f2f030022f2cbdce1050e4b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetUserUUID</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetUserUUID</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserUUID = Class.create();
GetUserUUID.prototype = {
    initialize: function(cluster_name, user_email) {
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/users/list';
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('post', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{"kind": "user", "length": 10000, "offset": 0}');
			status = response.status_code;
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			gs.info('GetUserUUID response is ' + responseBody);
			this.user_json = this.parseUserData(responseBody, user_email);
		} catch(ex) {
			var errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parseUserData : function(response, user_email) {
		var answer_json = JSON.parse(response);
		var uuid_json = {};
		uuid_json['projects'] = [];
		var user_data = answer_json.entities;
		for (var user_detail in user_data) {
			if (user_data[user_detail].status.name == user_email)  {
				uuid_json['name'] = user_data[user_detail].status.name;
				uuid_json['value'] = user_data[user_detail].metadata.uuid;
				var project_list = user_data[user_detail].status.resources.projects_reference_list;
				for (var project in project_list) {
					var project_json = {};
					project_json['name'] = project_list[project].name;
					project_json['uuid'] = project_list[project].uuid;
					uuid_json['projects'].push(project_json);
				}
		    }
		}
		return uuid_json;
	},

    type: 'GetUserUUID'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-12 16:23:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>05b310b20f2f030022f2cbdce1050e4b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>73</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserUUID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_05b310b20f2f030022f2cbdce1050e4b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-04 17:55:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_d6b2ce530f23430022f2cbdce1050ed4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetAPISpecification</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GetAPISpecification</name><script><![CDATA[var GetAPISpecification = Class.create();
GetAPISpecification.prototype = {
    initialize: function(variable_set) {
		
		var subvars = new global.nutanixssp_variable_substitution();
		for (var variable in variable_set){
			subvars.addProperty(variable, variable_set[variable]);
		}
		var user_configs = new GetUserUUID(variable_set['cluster_name'], subvars.properties.get('user_email'));
		subvars.addProperty('vm_user', user_configs.user_json['value']);
		var size_rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_vm_sizes');
		size_rec.addQuery('size', '=', variable_set['vm_size']);
		size_rec.query();
		while(size_rec.next()){
			subvars.addProperty("vm_num_vcpus", size_rec.number_cpu);
			subvars.addProperty("vm_memory_mb", size_rec.memory_in_mb);
		}

		var creds_rec = new GlideRecord('x_72900_nutanixssp_credentials');
		creds_rec.query();
		while(creds_rec.next()){
			subvars.addProperty(creds_rec.user_variable_name, creds_rec.user);
			subvars.addProperty(creds_rec.password_variable_name, creds_rec.password_token.getDecryptedValue());
		}

		var catalog_item_configs = new GetCatalogItem(variable_set['catalog_item']);
		subvars.setSubstitutionString(catalog_item_configs.api_specification);
		var updatedAPISpec = subvars.getSubstitutedString();
		if (catalog_item_configs.guest_customization) {
			subvars.setSubstitutionString(catalog_item_configs.guest_customization);
			var updatedCustomizationSpec = subvars.getSubstitutedString();
			var base64CustomizationSpec = gs.base64Encode(updatedCustomizationSpec);
			var guest_customization = {};
			var guest_customization_type = catalog_item_configs.guest_customization_type;
			if (guest_customization_type.toString() == "cloud_init") {
				guest_customization["cloud_init"] = {'user_data': base64CustomizationSpec.toString()};
			} else {
				guest_customization["sysprep"] = {'unattend_xml': base64CustomizationSpec.toString()};
			}
			parsedAPISpec = JSON.parse(updatedAPISpec);
			parsedAPISpec['spec']['resources']['guest_customization'] = guest_customization;
			gs.info('Disk UUID: ' + catalog_item_configs.uuid);
			parsedAPISpec['spec']['resources']['disk_list'][0]['data_source_reference']['uuid'] = catalog_item_configs.uuid.toString();
			this.apiSpecification = JSON.stringify(parsedAPISpec);
		} else {
			this.apiSpecification = updatedAPISpec;
		}
		gs.info('GetAPISpecification - Updated Specification: ' + this.apiSpecification);
    },

    type: 'GetAPISpecification'

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix VM Request">cdc3888d37cd1300b95dae7873990e5d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d5c7008137015300b95dae7873990e02</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Projects</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'prism_central_instance_needed', 'Select Prism Central Instance to Load Projects...');
		return;
	}
	
	g_form.clearOptions('project_uuid');
	g_form.clearOptions('network_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('network_uuid', 'project_needed', 'Select Project to Load Networks...');
	g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'loading', 'Loading Projects...');
	var ret = new GlideAjax('GetProjectsByUser');
	ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getProjectData');
	ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
	ret.getXML(loadProjects);
}

function loadProjects(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var project_json = JSON.parse(answer);
	var project_list = project_json['projects'];
	g_form.clearOptions('project_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('project_uuid', 'select', 'Select Project');
	for (var index in project_list) {
		if (project_list.hasOwnProperty(index)) {
			g_form.addOption('project_uuid', project_list[index].uuid, project_list[index].name);
		}
	}
	
}	]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-20 19:17:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ec41de724f21f2002b4522d18110c714</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Projects</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ec41de724f21f2002b4522d18110c714</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-22 18:54:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_65dc2ea737a51300b95dae7873990e07
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix Blueprint Request">2c1430e337611300b95dae7873990ed2</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:e07c016337a11300b95dae7873990e3c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Blueprint App Profiles</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('app_profile_uuid', 'blueprint_needed', 'Select Blueprint to Application Profiles...');
		return;
	}

	if (g_form.getValue('blueprint_uuid') != 'select' && g_form.getValue('blueprint_uuid') != 'loading' && g_form.getValue('blueprint_uuid') != 'project_needed') {
		g_form.clearOptions('app_profile_uuid');
		g_form.addOption('app_profile_uuid', 'loading', 'Loading Application Profiles...');
		var ret = new GlideAjax('GetBlueprintAppProfiles');
		ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getBlueprintInputData');
		ret.addParam('blueprint_uuid', g_form.getValue('blueprint_uuid'));
		ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
		ret.getXML(loadBlueprintInputs);
	} 
}

function loadBlueprintInputs(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var app_profile_json = JSON.parse(answer);
	g_form.clearOptions('app_profile_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('app_profile_uuid', 'select', 'Select Application Profile');
	for (var index in app_profile_json) {
		if (app_profile_json.hasOwnProperty(index)) {
			g_form.addOption('app_profile_uuid', JSON.parse(app_profile_json[index]).uuid, JSON.parse(app_profile_json[index]).name);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-24 21:33:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>65dc2ea737a51300b95dae7873990e07</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Blueprint App Profiles</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_65dc2ea737a51300b95dae7873990e07</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-25 12:57:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_1354da364f21f2002b4522d18110c760
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Nutanix VM Request">cdc3888d37cd1300b95dae7873990e5d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:5c9a08c137015300b95dae7873990e35</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Load Networks</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.addOption('vm_network_uuid', 'project_needed', 'Select Project to Load Networks...');
		return;
	}

	if (g_form.getValue('project_uuid') == 'select' || g_form.getValue('project_uuid') == 'loading' || g_form.getValue('project_uuid') == 'prism_central_instance_needed') {
		g_form.clearOptions('vm_network_uuid');
		g_form.addOption('vm_network_uuid', 'project_needed', 'Select Project to Load Networks...');
	} else {
		var project_uuid = g_form.getValue('project_uuid');
		g_form.clearOptions('vm_network_uuid');
		g_form.addOption('vm_network_uuid', 'loading', 'Loading Networks...');
		var ret = new GlideAjax('GetNetworksByProjectUUID');
		ret.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getNetworkData');
		ret.addParam('project_uuid', project_uuid);
		ret.addParam('cluster_name', g_form.getValue('cluster_name'));
		ret.getXML(loadNetworks);
	}
}
   
function loadNetworks(response) {
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	var networks = answer.evalJSON();
	g_form.clearOptions('vm_network_uuid');
	g_form.addOption('vm_network_uuid', 'select', 'Select Network');
	for (var index in networks) {
		if (networks.hasOwnProperty(index)) {
			g_form.addOption('vm_network_uuid', JSON.parse(networks[index]).value, JSON.parse(networks[index]).name);
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-20 19:31:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1354da364f21f2002b4522d18110c760</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Load Networks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1354da364f21f2002b4522d18110c760</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-03-22 18:55:11</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_29137cb60f6f030022f2cbdce1050eed
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetProjectsByUser</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetProjectsByUser</name><script><![CDATA[var GetProjectsByUser = Class.create();
GetProjectsByUser.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getProjectData: function() {
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/users/list';
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('post', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{"kind": "user", "length": 10000, "offset": 0}');
			status = response.status_code;
			gs.info("status is " + status);
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			gs.info("body is " + responseBody);
			return JSON.stringify(this.parseUserData(responseBody));
		} catch(ex) {
			var errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parseUserData : function(response) {
		var UserID = gs.getUser();
		var user_email = UserID.getEmail();
		var answer_json = JSON.parse(response);
		var uuid_json = {};
		uuid_json['projects'] = [];
		var user_data = answer_json.entities;
		for (var user_detail in user_data) {
			if (user_data[user_detail].status.name == user_email)  {
				uuid_json['name'] = user_data[user_detail].status.name;
				uuid_json['value'] = user_data[user_detail].metadata.uuid;
				var project_list = user_data[user_detail].status.resources.projects_reference_list;
				for (var project in project_list) {
					var project_json = {};
					project_json['name'] = project_list[project].name;
					project_json['uuid'] = project_list[project].uuid;
					uuid_json['projects'].push(project_json);
				}
		    }
		}
		return uuid_json;
    },

    type: 'GetProjectsByUser'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-01-12 18:49:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>29137cb60f6f030022f2cbdce1050eed</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetProjectsByUser</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29137cb60f6f030022f2cbdce1050eed</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-01-17 19:56:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_bd4ee62b37a51300b95dae7873990e08
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetBlueprintAppProfiles</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetBlueprintAppProfiles</name><script><![CDATA[var GetBlueprintAppProfiles = Class.create();
GetBlueprintAppProfiles.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getBlueprintInputData : function() {
		var blueprint_uuid = this.getParameter('blueprint_uuid');
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/blueprints/' + blueprint_uuid;
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('get', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{}');
			status = response.status_code;
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			return JSON.stringify(this.parseBlueprintInputData(responseBody));
		} catch(ex) {
			errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parseBlueprintInputData : function(response) {
		var blueprint_input_data = JSON.parse(response);
		var app_profile_list = blueprint_input_data.spec.resources.app_profile_list;
		var blueprint_app_profile_list = [];
			for (var index in app_profile_list) {
				var app_profile_name = app_profile_list[index].name;
				var app_profile_uuid = app_profile_list[index].uuid;
				blueprint_app_profile_list.push('{"name":"' + app_profile_name  + '","uuid":"' + app_profile_uuid + '"}');
			}
		return blueprint_app_profile_list;
	},
	
    type: 'GetBlueprintAppProfiles'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-24 21:40:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>bd4ee62b37a51300b95dae7873990e08</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBlueprintAppProfiles</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bd4ee62b37a51300b95dae7873990e08</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-04-25 12:54:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_75659a764f21f2002b4522d18110c716
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_72900_nutanixssp.GetNetworksByProjectUUID</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GetNetworksByProjectUUID</name><script><![CDATA[var GetNetworksByProjectUUID = Class.create();
GetNetworksByProjectUUID.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getNetworkData : function() {
		var project_uuid = this.getParameter('project_uuid');
		var cluster_name = this.getParameter('cluster_name');
		var cluster_configs = new GetClusterConfiguration();
		cluster_configs.setClusterName(cluster_name);
		cluster_configs.getClusterConfigs();
		var url = 'api/nutanix/v3/projects/' + project_uuid;
		var status, errorMsg, responseBody;
		try { 
			var response = new CallRestAPI('get', url, cluster_configs.ip, '{}');
			status = response.status_code;
			errorMsg = response.error_message;
			responseBody = response.response_body;
			return JSON.stringify(this.parseNetworkData(responseBody));
		} catch(ex) {
			errorMsg = ex;
		}
	},
	
	parseNetworkData : function(response) {
		var answer_json = JSON.parse(response);
		var network_list = [];
		var network_data = answer_json.status.resources.subnet_reference_list;
		for (var index in network_data) {
			if (network_data[index].kind == 'subnet') {
				var network_json = '{"name":"' + network_data[index].name  + '","value":"' + network_data[index].uuid + '"}';
				network_list.push(network_json);
			}
		}
		return network_list;

	},

    type: 'GetNetworksByProjectUUID'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-20 19:37:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>75659a764f21f2002b4522d18110c716</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetNetworksByProjectUUID</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NutanixSSPv5" source="x_72900_nutanixssp">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NutanixSSPv5">302dc1114fed32002b4522d18110c733</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75659a764f21f2002b4522d18110c716</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-15 17:59:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
